name: Peel Away® 1
description: Peel Away® 1 Heavy-Duty Paint Remover is the premier, industry-leading paint removal product formulated to remove up to 30 coats of lead, oil, and alkyd-based paints and coatings in a single application. Peel Away® 1 emulsifies the coating without need for sanding, eliminating the possibility of any dangerous lead airborne dust. Unlike other popular paint removers, Peel Away® 1 does not contain the dangerous chemicals methylene chloride or NMP, making it a much safer alternative for homeowners and professionals. This product is zero VOC, water-based, non-flammable, and biodegradable. Peel Away®1 is easily applied on interior and exterior wood, brick, stone, concrete, stucco, plaster, metal, steel, cast iron, fiberglass, carved and molded surfaces, and many more! All Peel Away® 1 containers contain a complete paint removal kit, including Dumond® Laminated Paper, Citri-Lize™ Neutralizer, a pH test kit, and a plastic applicator under the lid. Peel Away® 1 works best on pre-1980 based coatings
